backend/main.mo: Defines a booking actor with CRUD operations storing bookings in a Map and enforcing basic field validation.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking frontend files to implemented admin and navigation features with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading fonts and the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing navigation state and rendering pages with a header and footer.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Interactive booking form with validation, loading states, and submission via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying branding, contact details, services list, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle handling page navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteBooking.ts: Provides a mutation to delete a booking via the backend actor and refreshes the bookings list on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity loading through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all bookings or a single booking using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Submits a new booking with timestamp via the backend actor and invalidates booking queries after success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining warm light/dark themes, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for viewing, sorting, and deleting booking submissions using tables and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page displaying contact details and a booking form with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: A portfolio gallery page showing images in a grid with animations and a lightbox for enlarged viewing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with a hero section, call‑to‑action buttons, and a features list highlighting the studio’s strengths.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of photography service offerings, each with icons, descriptions, and key feature lists.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s state, existing features, requirements, and development metadata.
